notes: The health talent increases maximum health capacity, and keeps the current health percentage.
The agility talent effectively grants Ursa 1.67 armor, 10 attack speed, and 10 main attack damage.
Earthshock interrupts Ursa's channeling abilities upon cast.

Upon cast, Ursa leaps 250 range forwards, 83 range high, at a speed of 1000 and for up to 0.25 seconds. While in the air, other units may pass below Ursa. Always leaps towards the direction he is facing. Can leap over other units and over impassable terrain. Can leap over other units and over impassable terrain. During leap, Ursa can attack, turn, and cast abilities.
While in the air, other units may pass below Ursa.
Always leaps towards the direction he is facing. Can leap over other units and over impassable terrain.
Can leap over other units and over impassable terrain.
During leap, Ursa can attack, turn, and cast abilities.
Earthshock and the Enrage buff is applied upon losing the leap buff. If the leap gets interrupted in any way, Earthshock is applied at Ursa's current location.
If the leap gets interrupted in any way, Earthshock is applied at Ursa's current location.
Earthshock first applies the debuff, then the damage.

With Aghanim's Shard, Earthshock applies the current level of Enrage upon cast. Enrage notes fully apply. If it is not learned, no buff is applied. Only the incoming damage reduction and status resistance bonus are applied. Other of Enrage's cast effects (i.e. strong dispel, Aghanim's Scepter upgrade) are not applied. If the buff is already present, its duration gets extended by instead. In Ability Draft, Enrage must be drafted as well for it to get applied.
Enrage notes fully apply. If it is not learned, no buff is applied.
Only the incoming damage reduction and status resistance bonus are applied. Other of Enrage's cast effects (i.e. strong dispel, Aghanim's Scepter upgrade) are not applied.
If the buff is already present, its duration gets extended by instead.
In Ability Draft, Enrage must be drafted as well for it to get applied.
abilities.description: Ursa leaps forward 250 units and slams the earth, causing a powerful shock to damage and slow all enemy units in a nearby area for 4 seconds.
params: Causes Earthshock to apply a 1.5 second Enrage buff on yourself.
Slow persists if debuff was placed before spell immunity and when not dispelled.
The leap instantly ends when getting rooted. When cast while already rooted, results in an instant Earthshock at the current location.

notes: An attack charge is consumed whenever an attack is executed, missed attacks use up charges as well.
The number of remaining charges is visible on the buff icon. The buff and the visual effects of the ability are visible to everyone.
Successive casts do not stack, but refresh the whole amount of charges instead.
abilities.description: Using his skill in combat, Ursa gains increased attack speed for a number of subsequent attacks.

notes: On each attack Fury Swipes first adds 1 stack and then deals damage based on the stack count. This means that the bonus damage is applied even with the first attack.
This means that the bonus damage is applied even with the first attack.

The bonus damage is dealt in one instance together with the attack damage, and counts as attack damage as well. This means it can be affected or considered by anything that works with attack damage (e.g. lifesteal, cleave etc.). However, Fury Swipes is not considered by crit sources. The bonus damage is also not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions, but can be reduced with flat reductions.
This means it can be affected or considered by anything that works with attack damage (e.g. lifesteal, cleave etc.). However, Fury Swipes is not considered by crit sources.
The bonus damage is also not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions, but can be reduced with flat reductions.
For how much damage Fury Swipe deals on each level, and the total damage it accumulates over a certain amount of attacks, please refer to the chart below.
Each successful attack refreshes the whole stack. Missed attacks neither place the buff, nor add a stack, nor refresh it.
The number of Fury Swipe stacks is visible on the debuff icon placed on affected units.
Does not work against buildings, wards and allied units.
The stack duration increasing talent does not increase the debuff duration against Roshan.
abilities.description: Ursa's claws dig deeper wounds in the enemy, causing consecutive attacks to the same enemy to deal more damage. If the same target is not attacked after 10 seconds, the bonus damage is lost.
params: Prevents gaining new stacks. Already existing stacks still provide bonus attack damage.

notes: Enrage interrupts Ursa's channeling abilities upon cast.
Applies a strong dispel on Ursa upon cast.

Applies generic incoming damage reduction on Ursa. Stacks additively with other sources of generic incoming damage manipulation. The reduction affects all damage Ursa takes that is not flagged as HP removal.
The reduction affects all damage Ursa takes that is not flagged as HP removal.
The status resistance stacks multiplicatively with other sources of status resistance.

With Aghanim's Scepter, Enrage can be cast while stunned, cycloned, slept, taunted, hidden or during forced movement. It cannot be cast while silenced, hexed or prevented from acting. Ursa is unable to ⇧ Shift-queue this ability upon acquiring Aghanim's Scepter.
It cannot be cast while silenced, hexed or prevented from acting.
Ursa is unable to ⇧ Shift-queue this ability upon acquiring Aghanim's Scepter.
Causes Ursa's model to glow red and increases its size by 20%. This has no impact on his collision size.
Multiple casts of Enrage do not stack, but refresh the duration. Does not extend the duration of an existing Enrage buff.
Does not extend the duration of an existing Enrage buff.
abilities.description: Ursa goes into a frenzy, providing damage reduction and status resistance. Removes any existing debuffs.
params: Reduces cooldown and allows Ursa to use Enrage while disabled.

description: Ulfsaar, the Ursa Warrior (or simply Ursa), is a melee agility hero whose abilities' main focus is the increase of attack damage, allowing for some of the most impressive sustained damage in the entire game.
history: Ulfsaar the warrior is the fiercest member of an ursine tribe, protective of his land and his people. During the long winters, while the mothers sleep and nurse their cubs, the males patrol the lands above—as tireless, vigilant defenders of their ancient ways. Hearing dim but growing rumors of a spreading evil, Ulfsaar headed out beyond the boundaries of his wild wooded homeland, intending to track down and destroy the threat at its source, before it could endanger his people. He is a proud creature with a bright strong spirit, utterly trustworthy, a staunch ally and defender.
